author: eptwts
text:
the best way to build a solid brand is to run it with humility & 100% transparency...

don't make false claims & don't oversell yourself

also be completely transparent about why you're doing it in the first place...

there's nothing wrong with posting valuable content so that later down the lines you can then sell your expertise or form partnerships with your audience

but please don't be one of those guys who says "i have nothing to sell you" as a trust-building strategy & then upsells every lead your high-ticket service in DM's

ultimately trust has the biggest compound effect on your conversion rate

the secret to building trust is that there is no secret, you just have to be humble & honest
